name: eggbeatr
description: eggbeatr is a web application to schedule instructors with  lessons. It does the tedious work, leaving you with creative control.

scripts.install: cd src/client; npm install; cd ../server; npm install
scripts.start: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd '$(pwd)'/src/client; npm run start"' -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd '$(pwd)'/src/server; npm run start"'
scripts.build: cd src/client; npm run build; cd ../server; npm run build
